title: Rediscovering İzmir’s Historic Hans
content: The İzmir Time Machine is bringing the city’s historic han buildings back into public memory through digital reconstruction and an interactive mapping platform.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Building an Open-Source Strategy for the Semantic Web
content: We are pleased to share an upcoming article by La Tempesta, “Building an Open Source Strategy for the Semantic Web”, to be published on 3 February on the La Tempesta blog.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: New Master Programs at Universität Hamburg
content: The portfolio includes programs in the humanities, social sciences, communication, and informatics, as well as several English-taught and international master’s degrees.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Examination of Nominations for the Urgent Safeguarding List (2025)
content: The Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage examines nominations for possible inscription on the List of Intangible Cultural Heritage in Need of Urgent Safeguarding.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Three Grant Opportunities Supporting Archives, Research, and Creativity
content: The 2026 APE Grants are now open!
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time

title: Opening Up Castle History Through Digital Humanities
content: Hohensalzburg Digital is a Digital Humanities project realized at the University of Salzburg that exemplifies how digital methods can transform the way we access, understand, and connect cultural heritage.
creator: Antonia Bobik
sourceDescription: Join us on a journey through time
